synopsis.text:
Akira's life takes a dark turn when demons, once forgotten and thought to be mythical, resurface in modern-day Tokyo, causing chaos and paranoia. As fear grips the city, suspicion among humans rises, leading to violence and anarchy. Unbeknownst to Akira, a demon named Amon resides within him, waiting for the opportune moment to unleash its wrath upon the world.

After a personal tragedy pushes Akira's psyche to its breaking point, Amon seizes control, transforming Akira into the powerful Devilman. With this newfound strength, Akira battles the demonic forces threatening humanity. However, the constant struggle takes a toll on his mental state, as he fights to maintain control over his own body.

As the war between humans and demons escalates, Akira's girlfriend Miki falls victim to the violence, leaving him devastated. With his will to fight shattered, Amon's influence grows stronger, pushing Akira to the brink of losing himself completely. The final battle for control over his body unfolds within Akira's own mind, as he desperately fights to regain dominance over the malevolent force that seeks to consume him. Will Akira emerge victorious, or will Amon's sadistic nature prevail?
